attributes.action: Incorporate rather than demolish Manor Garden Allotments within the 2012 Olympic site
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: 100 year old Manor Garden Allotments lies in the middle of the Olympic Park site. These beautiful, productive vegetable gardens are due to be demolished to make way for a four-week footpath during the 2012 Games despite the land being given in perpetuity. A campaign is underway to protect the allotments and encourage a more imaginative Olympic development which includes this special place with its healthy, green lifestyles  and vibrant community.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Incorporate rather than demolish Manor Garden Allotments within the 2012 Olympic site."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11532.asp

Prime Minister's Office
